title: A woman in Alabama whose 28-year-old son died of COVID-19 regrets not getting vaccinated and said his last words were 'this is not a hoax, this is real'
content:
1. A woman in Alabama whose 28-year-old son died of COVID-19 regrets not getting vaccinated and said his last words were 'this is not a hoax, this is real'  Yahoo News
  2. Atlanta restaurant gets death threats over requiring COVID-19 vaccine  FOX 5 Atlanta
  3. A Georgia restaurant will refuse service for unvaccinated people after breakthrough COVID infections among fully vaccinated staff  Yahoo News
  4. Atlanta restaurant announces plan to serve only vaccinated customers  WSB Atlanta
  5. Many now have immunity against COVID-19 but don't lower guard, say experts  Mathrubhumi English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 28歳の息子をCOVID-19で亡くしたアラバマ州の女性は、予防接種を受けなかったことを後悔しており、彼の最後の言葉は「これはデマではなく、本物だ」だったと語っています。
阿拉巴马州一名妇女的28岁儿子死于COVID-19，她后悔没有接种疫苗，并说他的最后一句话是 "这不是一个骗局，这是真的
阿拉巴馬州一名婦女的28歲兒子死於COVID-19，她後悔沒有接種疫苗，並說他的最後一句話是 "這不是一個騙局，這是真的
